Package org.anchoranalysis.mpp.mark.conic

Class Ellipse

Object
Mark
MarkWithPosition
ConicBase
Ellipse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Ellipse extends ConicBase implements Serializable
Represents a 2D ellipse mark.
See Also:
